Know your ex’s current partner or have them know your current partner?
Be loved by someone you can never love back or love someone who doesn’t love you?
Be rejected in public or rejected in private?
Have your biggest secret told on live TV or never tell it but always live with the guilt?
Be friend-zoned forever or be used for convenience?
Find out your partner cheated or be the one who cheated?
Be the one who always forgives or the one who is never forgiven?
Lose your voice for a month or lose the ability to hear for a month?
Be with someone who never fights or someone who fights all the time?
Date someone who is emotionally unavailable or someone who is too clingy?
Have your relationship exposed online or your family secrets exposed?
Be the jealous one or be the one who causes jealousy?
Know when your partner is thinking about someone else or never know at all?
Be with someone who has a huge secret or someone with no past?
Be the one who ends a relationship or the one who gets dumped?
Have your partner’s ex follow you on social media or have your ex follow them?
Be loved for your looks but not your personality or for your personality but not your looks?
Be in a long-distance relationship or a secret relationship?
Be stuck in the past or afraid of the future?
